mapper.sql: Questions_ID, Content,QuesPic_URL, Subject_ID, Knowledge_ID1, Knowledge_ID2, Knowledge_ID3, Knowledge_ID4, Type_ID, Difficulty_ID, Charact_ID, Isdelete, Answer,AnswerPic_URL,UpdateTime,UploadTime,Author
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM questions ORDER BY UploadTime DESC
SELECT Questions_ID,Content,QuesPic_URL,Answer,AnswerPic_URL FROM questions WHERE Subject_ID=#{param1} AND date(UploadTime)=#{param2}

SELECT questions.Questions_ID,types.Type_name,questions.QuesPic_URL,questions.AnswerPic_URL FROM questions,types WHERE questions.Type_ID=types.Type_ID AND questions.Questions_ID=#{questionsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
SELECT * FROM questions WHERE Type_ID=#{param1} AND Difficulty_ID=#{param2}

mapper.update:
update questions
Content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
QuesPic_URL = #{quesPic_URL,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Subject_ID = #{subjectId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Knowledge_ID1 = #{knowledgeId1,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Knowledge_ID2 = #{knowledgeId2,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Knowledge_ID3 = #{knowledgeId3,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Knowledge_ID4 = #{knowledgeId4,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Type_ID = #{typeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Difficulty_ID = #{difficultyId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Charact_ID = #{charactId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Isdelete = #{isdelete,jdbcType=BIT},
Answer = #{answer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AnswerPic_URL = #{answerPic_URL,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UpdateTime=#{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
UploadTime=#{uploadTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
where Questions_ID = #{questionsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update questions set Content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QuesPic_URL = #{quesPic_URL,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Subject_ID = #{subjectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Knowledge_ID1 = #{knowledgeId1,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Knowledge_ID2 = #{knowledgeId2,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Knowledge_ID3 = #{knowledgeId3,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Knowledge_ID4 = #{knowledgeId4,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Type_ID = #{typeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Difficulty_ID = #{difficultyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Charact_ID = #{charactId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Isdelete = #{isdelete,jdbcType=BIT}, Answer = #{answer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AnswerPic_URL = #{answerPic_URL,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UpdateTime=NULL , Upload=Upload where Questions_ID = #{questionsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
